body_content.explanation: someone who works on a building site (= an area of land where something is being built) whose job is to make sure that vehicles and heavy machinery are used correctly and safely:
examples: We had to have a banksman for the crane.

body_content.explanation: someone who works at the top of a shaft (= tunnel) or pit (= hole) at a mine (= a place where coal or another mineral is dug out of the ground) and is in charge of the device that is used to move workers, coal, etc. up and down:
examples: My grandfather was a banksman, in charge of the cage at the mine pithead.
